affect.title: Word-level norms and IDs from Reading Brain Project
columns_descriptions: Word (lowercase)
Lemma
Unique ID of the sentence the word is part of
Position of the word in the sentence (Word ID within the sentence)
Is it a content word? (binary)
Is it a non content / function word (binary, mostly opposite as previous)?
Is it a numeral? (binary)
Is it either a numeral or a non-content word (binary)
Target_Word?
Ortographic neighbourhood density from English Lexicon Project
Word length
Mean lexical decision latency (in msec) from English Lexicon Project
Mean naming latency (in msec) for a particular word across participants from English Lexicon Project
Number of syllables
Imageability (MRC Database)
Concreteness (from Brysbaert et al., 2014 Concreteness database)
Phonological neighbourhood density from English Lexicon Project
Log frequency from HAL frequency norms
Age of acquisition (from Kuperman et al. 2012 AoA database)
Number of Phonemes
PC1_Length?
Unique ID to cross-reference words and event files, i.e. SentenceID and Word joined with # as separator
